translation: Verily, no one can remain for even a moment without performing action; for everyone is made to act helplessly, indeed, by the qualities born of Nature.
commentary: 3.5 Not not? Someone anyone? moment a moment? Even even? Jatu verily? remains remains? Akarmakrit without performing action? Karyate is made to do? Hi for? Of course helpless? Karma action? Everyone all? Prakritijaih born of Prakriti? Gunaih by the alities.Commentary The Gunas (alities of Nature) are three? viz.? Sattva? Rajas and Tamas. Sattva is harmony or light or purity Rajas is passion or motion Tamas is inertia
